title: Getting back to normal will be 'gradual' and in stages, Haggie says - CBC.ca
description: Health Minister John Haggie said Friday morning that if people were previously told they didn't meet the threshold for a COVID-19 test, they could can 811 back and request a test.
content:
The government of Newfoundland and Labrador announced four new cases of COVID-19 within the province in the last 24 hours on Friday.
The new cases are in Eastern Health region of the province, bringing the total caseload to 256.
"If you must go out for esse… [+5217 chars]
